96  void writeTo(std::ostream& O) const {
97  const Config& q = configuration();
98  const Point& P = q.position();
99  O << '(' << P.xCoord() << ", " << P.yCoord() << ", "
100  << q.orientation() << ", " << translationVelocity()
101  << ", " << rotationVelocity() << ')';
